alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Hamilton; Polk (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 07 at 1:51PM CDT until August 07 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east Tennessee, including the following counties, Bradley, Hamilton and Polk. * WHEN...Until 445 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 251 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Chattanooga, Ridgeside, South Cleveland, Wildwood Lake, Collegedale, Flint Springs, Red Clay State Park, Waterville, Apison, Gap Springs, Ooltewah, East Brainerd, Conasauga, Parksville, East Ridge, Big Frog Mountain and Lookout Mountain. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
